message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. HBV can be spread through all routes listed - blood, sexual contact, maternal-fetal, and breast milk. Therefore, option B is correct. It is important to educate the patient on ways to prevent transmission and protect loved ones, such as using barrier methods during sexual activity and avoiding sharing needles or other items that can spread blood-borne diseases.
